comments.author: haridara@gmail.com
comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_6_7) AppleWebKit/534.24 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/11.0.696.57 Safari/534.24
Build Identifier: 3.1.10

First of all the custom snooze takes too many steps and on top of that the Enter button doesn't work, which means you have to reach out for mouse, asking for an extra step.


Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Setup an alarm and wait for the reminder to popup.
2. Click on "Snooze for"
3. Enter a number in the box at the bottom
4. Press <Enter>.

Actual Results:  
The <Enter> is ignored.

Expected Results:  
The reminder is snoozed.
comments.creator: haridara@gmail.com
